text:
Good work
If you're on break, would you like a drink?

Eh
What's up with you suddenly...?

You've been working really hard lately, right?
I was just wanting to reward you're efforts.

Heehhh
That's a good attitude, isn't it.

Well, the truth is, I've been trying way to hard,
...and everyone is so serious that it's sweltering...

...but, it might not be so bad,
Is what you're thinking, right?

Well, compared to before I was an idol,
it's not as tedious I guess.

Hm? What wrong?
Something that's hard for you to say?

More importantly, is my drink still not prepared?
I'm really in the mood for some delicious black tea you know.

Ah, right, sorry sorry.
I'll prepare some right away!
